posts.author: SkagHunter
posts.content:
Hey guys. Just thought up an interesting character idea, a bard that dual weilds hammers/maces to make his "music" in battle

1 PvM mainly, though it he can survive a bit of PvP all the better
2 Max lvl 30
3 Half orc, human, or half elf (Half Orc subraces generally have +2 to con while the elf subrace would have +2 to cha)
4 Bard with wm added at somepoint... preferably later on in the build (Need to complete a quest to aquire WM unless i'm mistaken)
Build based around some form of blunt weapon, either dual weilding maces/light hammers or maybe warhammer/shield. 
I'm not sure if Dex based is the way to go or Str based.
Primary use of magic would be to buff self with maybe a stun or two thrown in
Factors needed
Build would be used on arelith so must take atleast 3 of a class before going to a different class
"Gifts" can be taken for +2 to a stat, cannot be stacked (ex, no +4 dex, but could possibly have +2 dex +2 con)

Thanks for your time!

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
Sorry man, but you want dual-wielding and weapon master in a level 30 persistent world? That's really tough. And as for the dexterity part, here is one thing. Always go strength-based in low level - low magic environments, can't stress that enough,

I am assuming you are good with a warhammer and shield strength build, correct? Then we can make something that will work splendidly, How a Human (Bard 17/ Fighter 6/ Weapon Master 7) sounds to you?

posts.author: SkagHunter
posts.content: Sounds good.  If it's not asking too much, would it be possible to pull out a half-orc build too (or instead?), as the server is split into two areas, Underdark and Surface, and the human would most likely be on the surface, i prefer my nice dark caves ^,..,^

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content: Sure man, everything is possible (unless it is a dual-wielding, dexterity-based, half-orc weapon master in just thirty levels!). Tell me again what are the total adjustments of the Half-Orc race so i can make the build. Am i correct to assume it is (+2 STR/ +2 CON/ -2 INT/ -2 CHA)?

posts.author: SkagHunter
posts.content: The half orc is +2 str +2 con -2chr -2 int, altough i can get it to two +4's on the str and con or one +4 and no penaltys to charisma with gifts
